Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its high value and quality, I understand its worth to you is $12,000. To ensure we both benefit from this transaction, I propose a special introductory price of $11,000. This offer includes all the features you're looking for, along with a comprehensive warranty and exceptional customer support. I trust this proposal will be mutually beneficial. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
